4302380.name: Absolved Demo
4302380.description:
Single player horror where you must wait out the night while supernatural entities make their way ever closer.

Demo Includes the first two nights.

A chance at freedom

Jumping at the opportunity to be a free man, "no strings attached". You take up an offer that the warden gave to all lifers. Seven nights in some dilapidated storehouse? sounded easy enough. Now you sit in a barely lit room waiting for further instruction.

Too late to turn back now

Alone & shackled to a chair. You're armed with a flash bulb from an old camera, a thee-position switch for some shutter doors, & a CCTV feed. The objective is simple...

Survive until morning and KEEP THEM OUT.
4302380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
